name: Escape It (Cosmin Calian)
description:
Welcome to my game's page.

This game is in developing, I'm a student with some free time and I spend all of it working on games. I really love to make games and buying this game motivates me to work a lot more and to finish this project.

If you play this game please leave a comment and tell me what I can do better or if you have ideas for another levels, I'm wide open to suggestions.
